Perhaps, if your wisdom allows, I can teach you a promotional spell. I can also sell you certain amulets. Lastly, I can teach you the Wisdom of Solitude.
A noble elf, called Caranim, enchants people with this blessing. You can find him in the great tree close to Ashbere.
I have heard, yet I am not certain, that an aged man called Zeltone handles this blessing. I can't really put my finger on the map, but I have been told he lives in the desert somewhere.
Yes, I know the one who blesses people with the fire of the suns. He's a very nice man, and he lives in the city of Casteldine.

A very young boy, indeed, teaches this blessing. He's very eager, and sometimes quite arrogant. But you can't hold that against him, teens these days! If you want to pay him a visst, he's in the tower north-west of Celeres.

There are 5 different blessings which you can recieve from five different persons. These are the Spark of the Phoenix, the Embrace of the Lost Lands, the Fire of the Suns, the Wisdom of Solitude and the Spiritual Shielding. I can bless you with the wisdom of solitude.

I do have two different amulets in my possession, both of great power. The first one, perhaps less mystical, is the protection amulet. Secondly, an amulet which gives the bearer unmatchable powers, the amulet of loss.
Casteldine is the grand capital in the east.
Celeres used to be the capital of Lithaton, but when a castle was built to honour King Arturo, he moved there.
Tha'Reen is a quite newly established trading centrum.
A peaceful and lovely city, whose inhabitants appears to dislike the king.
King Arturo is a great leader.
